title: [M Remastered] The X-Files (Suite Mix) #1996# Mark Snow
description:
M Presents
Music From Series
The X-Files

artist: Mark Snow

format: mp3

This is music [score] from the TV series "The X-Files". This is not what is on the official "The Truth And The Light: Music From The X-Files" album from 1996

===

tracklist:

01 Lamenta (Song Of Sorrow) (Suite Mix)
02 Introitus: Praeceps Transito Spatium (Introduction: On The Edge Of Travel Through Space) (Suite Mix)
03 Materia Primoris: The X-Files Theme (Suite Mix)
04 Raptus (Abduction) (Suite Mix)
05 Adelatus (Inspired Breath) (Suite Mix)
06 Deverbero (A Sound Thrashing) (Suite Mix)
07 Cantus Excio (Chant Of Exorcism) (Suite Mix)
08 Mercutura (The Merchandise) (Suite Mix)
09 Insequi (Hot Pursuit) (Suite Mix)
10 Otium (Peace) (Suite Mix)
11 Dubitatio (In Doubt) (Suite Mix)
12 Iter (Journey) (Suite Mix)
13 Progigno De Axis (The Offspring Of Axis) (Suite Mix)
14 Facetus Malum (Comic Misfortune) (Suite Mix)
15 Memoria (Remembrance) (Suite Mix)
16 Mitis Lumen (Soft Light) (Suite Mix)
17 The X-Files Suite Epilogue

===

The biggest difference between this release and "The Truth And The Light" is that there are no spoken parts- no audio clips from the series! There is only music with in addition is mixed in a differenr way. In some pieces you almost won't hear what is to be distinguished ["Iter"] but in others you will hear it very clearly ["Materia Primoris"]. All of the tracks here are taken from "Suite From The X-Files" which can be found on "The Snow Files" [http://musicbrainz.org/release/ef258fd2-c106-4525-a3b9-16c9d49b7357.html]. There is nothing more and nothing less in this Suite than there is in this release. [And so: "The Truth And The Light" contains 4 more tracks but there isn't tgis one which is at the end of Suite - #17]. The track list order is as it goes on the Suite [partially different than on "The Truth And The Light"]

===

I've remasterd all of the tracks by adjusting the volume or making them lauder where it needed to be done [without quality lost] and also cleaned them of any pitches / glitches- this is why I take credit for this bootleg album

===

There will be more rare / remastered music coming up. I have a low upload but I will keep seeding this torrent for weeks
